sense.gloss: diplomatic message sent by a head of state, sovereign letter
book written in Japanese (as opposed to Chinese, etc.), Japanese book, national literature (of Japan)

sdata.j: ↑世界↑↓せかい↓↑的↑↓てき↓に↑過大↑↓かだい↓に↑評価↑↓ひょうか↓された↑中|国↑↓ちゅうごく↓↑書|↑↓しょ↓といえば、『↑孫子↑↓まごこ↓』ですかね。
sdata.e: When it comes to Chinese books that are overvalued worldwide I suppose it's Sun Tzu, isn't it?
